turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a Espresso from a Starbucks of Mulch Highway in Jacksonville, Florida.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is it the location on Northside dr?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's the one of Philips Highway. The address is 7153 Philips Highway, Jacksonville, Florida 32256.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh got it! thanks so much!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You're welcome. I would like to get Caramel Macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay a Caramel Macchiato, which size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, tall. Any preference on the type of milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want to add sugar at all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's okay. I think it comes with a lot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so a tall Caramel Macchiato, with whole milk. Is that all for you today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay! give me a moment while I send over your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.
